title: How to Get Motivated â€” 5 Ways to Motivate Yourself

json.text: Hey influencer this week we have five tips for how to keep
yourself motivated right now
so building your influence with online video can a lot of times
feel like an uphill climb and it's easy to get discourage and lose your motivation,
so here are five quick tips for keeping yourself motivated
tip number one figure out your why or reconnect with your why
really important to have a good why, a reason for why you are doing all this
whether you are starting a business, you are pursuing a career,
you're living out your passion, the why, the reason why all of that
even matters, you know why is it that you want to be successful
for me personally my family my wife my children those are my number one whys in life
and I have that image in my head no matter what time of the day
whether I wake up whether I just got done with a whole days work and i'm a little tired
having that image and that why is what keep(s) me going and keeps me motivated
That's huge and actually the first part of motivation is motive, that's your why,
the reason you do stuff and so tap into your why or come out with a better why a bigger
why to capture a new motivation
tip number two focus on your health your food fitness and your sleep absolutely
when you are in tip top shape your body is working to its max capacity you are just
gonna feel better and end up being more motivated. Absolutely and
I heard a quote that said tired eyes rarely see a bright future so if you're lacking motivation
maybe you just need a rest you need to get some healthy food in you and
recapture the physical energy to stay motivated.
tip number three invest in what inspired you
yeah I think to stay inspired it helps to maybe if you like
reading to read some good books to go to atmosphere, maybe you like to travel
so get out of the house and go get into an environment that'll inspires you or maybe
watch youtubers that inspired you but take some either time or money and invest
in the things that are going to charge you up and get you ready to go
number four music absolutely the easiest fastest in my opinion to get more motivated
when you are kinda down because music and some good ear phones
pumping into your brain it just raises the energy level up
it's actually proven that music
changes your mood so if your mood it's not motivated if you are feeling discourage or
depressed be intentional to choose music that will actually affect your emotions and
you can get pumped up and one thought is to actually create a playlist of songs
that are meaningful to you songs that remind you to your why
and when you are listening to those songs you start to get pumped and you are ready to go
tip number five surround yourself with positive people
what I mean by this is surround yourself with
people that are going to bring your energy level up that are going to inspire you
because I feel when you put those kind of people around you that it just makes you
want to work harder go further and just be motivated
Yeah I heard a quote once that said people are like elevators
they either bring you up or they bring you down
and so pick some people that charge you up, that are like minded,
if they have the passion for the same things,
it's like electric when you get together,
or maybe go to events or conferences of people that share the same passion.
Another term that I liked is this mastermind idea
like to maybe create this year just a group of even just one other person or a couple other people
that whenever you get together you get refuel, remotivated, recharge
to go back out there and crush it.
Question of the day.
What are your tips for staying motivated? Please put them down in the comments area.
And remember that some of the best tips and feedback comes from you influencers in this community
so we are excited to hear from you and connect with you in the comments

impact with online videos.
